statements: SELECT * FROM material_sourcing_info;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name, supplier_location FROM material_sourcing_info;
SELECT material_name, sustainability_rating FROM material_sourcing_info WHERE sustainability_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM material_sourcing_info WHERE supplier_location = 'China';
SELECT supplier_name, COUNT(supplier_name) AS total_suppliers FROM material_sourcing_info GROUP BY supplier_name ORDER BY total_suppliers DESC;
SELECT * FROM material_sourcing_info WHERE sustainability_rating > 3 ORDER BY supplier_location DESC;
SELECT material_name, supplier_name FROM material_sourcing_info WHERE supplier_location = 'London';
SELECT * FROM material_sourcing_info WHERE supplier_name LIKE 'S%';
SELECT material_name, supplier_location FROM material_sourcing_info WHERE sustainability_rating BETWEEN 2 AND 4 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(material_id) AS total_materials, AVG(sustainability_rating) AS avg_rating FROM material_sourcing_info;
SELECT * FROM materials;
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'Metal';
SELECT material_name, source_location FROM materials ORDER BY source_location DESC;
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_location LIKE 'New%';
SELECT project_name, material_name FROM projects INNER JOIN materials ON projects.material_id = materials.material_id;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE material_type = 'metal'
SELECT material_id, material_name FROM materials ORDER BY material_id ASC
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE project_location LIKE 'New%'
SELECT * FROM projects WHERE material_id IS NOT NULL
SELECT project_id, project_name, material_name FROM projects INNER JOIN materials ON projects.material_id = materials.material_id
SELECT * FROM material_suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM material_suppliers WHERE certification_status = TRUE;
SELECT material_name, quantity, price FROM materials WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects WHERE project_location = 'New York';
SELECT supplier_name, location, certification_status FROM material_suppliers WHERE supplier_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM material_suppliers;
SELECT supplier_name, location FROM material_suppliers WHERE certification_status = true;
SELECT project_name, start_date, end_date FROM construction_projects ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT supplier_name, material_name, quantity, price FROM material_suppliers JOIN materials ON material_suppliers.supplier_id = materials.supplier_id;
SELECT project_name, material_name, price FROM construction_projects JOIN materials ON construction_projects.material_id = materials.material_id WHERE materials.quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM materials
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE is_sustainable = TRUE
SELECT supplier_name, contact_person, email_address FROM suppliers ORDER BY supplier_name DESC
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2021-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-01-01'
SELECT m.material_name, s.supplier_name, ms.price FROM materials m JOIN material_suppliers ms ON m.material_id = ms.material_id JOIN suppliers s ON ms.supplier_id = s.supplier_id
SELECT material_name, material_type FROM materials WHERE is_sustainable = TRUE ORDER BY material_name ASC
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE email_address LIKE '%@example.com'
SELECT project_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM projects WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2023-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC

SELECT materials.material_name, suppliers.supplier_name, price FROM material_suppliers INNER JOIN materials ON materials.material_id = material_suppliers.material_id INNER JOIN suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = material_suppliers.supplier_id WHERE price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC

SELECT materials.material_type, suppliers.supplier_name, projects.project_name FROM material_suppliers INNER JOIN materials ON materials.material_id = material_suppliers.material_id INNER JOIN suppliers ON suppliers.supplier_id = material_suppliers.supplier_id INNER JOIN projects ON projects.project_id = materials.material_id ORDER BY materials.material_type DESC
SELECT * FROM materials LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, price FROM materials WHERE category = 'Wood';
SELECT name, quantity FROM materials ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT * FROM suppliers WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT material_id, name, category, supplier_id FROM materials WHERE price < 50;
SELECT * FROM materials WHERE category = 'Wood' ORDER BY price DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT name, price FROM materials WHERE supplier_id = 3 AND price < 100 ORDER BY price;
SELECT m.name, p.name AS project_name, pm.quantity FROM materials m JOIN project_materials pm ON m.material_id = pm.material_id JOIN projects p ON pm.project_id = p.project_id WHERE pm.quantity > 10;
SELECT r.review_id, m.name AS material_name, r.rating, r.reviewer_name FROM materials m JOIN material_reviews r ON m.material_id = r.material_id WHERE r.rating > 3;

SELECT DISTINCT s.name AS supplier_name, COUNT(pm.quantity) AS total_materials FROM suppliers s JOIN materials m ON s.supplier_id = m.supplier_id JOIN project_materials pm ON m.material_id = pm.material_id GROUP BY s.name HAVING total_materials > 5 ORDER BY total_materials DESC;
